review: My mom was suffered alot with her irregular size and shape of her front teeth. So we searched  for a best economical hospital in Practo nearby our area. We have visited Smile Miles Dental Hospital and took appointment. Dr. Srikanth Guduguntla and Dr. Kalyani Guduguntla are very friendly and I seriously appreciate their way of response. They fully understood my Mom's pain and gave her a hope that they will try their level best to change her smile in our budget. They did a great job though it is a complicated case. We are very thankful for their sincere efforts and treatment provided.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had visited this hospital with previous experience but this time I had very bad experience. 
When I visited for treatment ,Doctor has seen explained about the Dental treatment said about the charges, I said ok, by the time he took me to X-ray room he find there was no power so he couldn't get the X-ray and did the treatment. After completing treatment he asked me to visit after two days for review, what I have paid for treatment he didn't gave any receipt or any prescription. 
I had visited hospital after 10days for review and said i am feeling pain were I had treatment, for that doctor said we need to take x-ray it will be extra, I said last you haven't taken since no power. Doctor says we haven't charged you last time for X-ray but my last time when I visited for treatment and discuss about treatment and charges he didn't awar there's no power. 

Doctors lie's in this way whom we have to trust.
reply_text: We did not charge you for the x-ray in the first visit because we couldn't take it it because of the power failure and when you came for your 2nd visit we told you we will be charging for x-ray. please understand for 200rs i donot have to  lie and lose my patient and reputation

1). Please don't write false allegations.The total amount of 4500Rs includes scaling plus polishing and 3 teeth fillings. 
2) The treatment charges was explained to you prior to treatment and after your acceptance only we started your treatment
3.) Infact you started bargaining after the completion of your treatment
